title: Generalized Information Bottleneck for Gaussian Variables. (arXiv:2303.17762v1 [cs.IT])
abstract: The information bottleneck (IB) method offers an attractive framework for understanding representation learning, however its applications are often limited by its computational intractability. Analytical characterization of the IB method is not only of practical interest, but it can also lead to new insights into learning phenomena. Here we consider a generalized IB problem, in which the mutual information in the original IB method is replaced by correlation measures based on Renyi and Jeffreys divergences. We derive an exact analytical IB solution for the case of Gaussian correlated variables. Our analysis reveals a series of structural transitions, similar to those previously observed in the original IB case. We find further that although solving the original, Renyi and Jeffreys IB problems yields different representations in general, the structural transitions occur at the same critical tradeoff parameters, and the Renyi and Jeffreys IB solutions perform well under the original IB o

translated_title: 高斯变量的广义信息瓶颈问题
translated_abstract: 信息瓶颈方法为理解表示学习提供了一个有吸引力的框架，然而其应用常常受到其计算难度的限制。信息瓶颈方法的解析描述不仅在实践上具有重要意义，而且可以引导我们对学习现象有新的认识。本文考虑了一个广义的信息瓶颈问题，其中原始信息瓶颈方法中的互信息被基于Renyi和Jeffreys差异的相关度量所替代。我们针对相关的高斯变量导出了一个精确的分析解，分析揭示了一系列结构性的转变，类似于以前在原始信息瓶颈情况下观察到的转变。我们进一步发现，尽管解决原始的、Renyi和Jeffreys IB问题通常会产生不同的表示，但结构性的转变都发生在相同的关键折衷参数处，而Renyi和Jeffreys IB的解决方案在原始IB上表现良好。
tldr: 本文考虑了高斯变量的广义信息瓶颈问题，给出了精确的分析解，并发现Renyi和Jeffreys IB的解决方案在原始IB上表现良好。
en_tdlr: This paper considers the generalized information bottleneck problem for Gaussian variables, provides an exact analytical solution, and finds that the solutions of the Renyi and Jeffreys IB problems perform well under the original IB.
